transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Haan ji sir Preeti baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se aap se baat kar rahi hu bataiye.
Customer: Are phone kara hai main yahi puch raha hu ki mere phone mein resign to lead jo hai by lead hatho hath show nahi kar pa rahi hai do lead dikhata hai magar baki 24 ghante purani 12 ghante purani 11 ghante purani 9 ghante purani aisa current ka state nahi aa rahi hai.
Executive: Haan maine abhi pucha hai dobara se iske liye to wo ye keh rahe the ki desktop mein to jaldi dikh jati hai aur agar aapko mobile se consume karni hai to aap search karke consume kariye aur wo kya kehte hai aapka product jo jis product ki lead aap search kar rahe hai uska filter laga lijiye jaise aata hai bagal mein filter aata hai wo product select karne ka.
Customer: [inaudible] [unintelligible]
Executive: Waha par wo karke aur search.
Customer: [unintelligible]
Executive: Recent.
Customer: Recent wale filter ki baat nahi kar rahi hu sir main.
Customer: Are aap location wale ki to baat kar rahe ho na.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm.
Customer: Location wale se koi fark nahi padega koi fark nahi padega ye sab ye duniya ki duniya ke maine do char logo apne staff mein deke sabke phone mein chal gaya current ka system lekin hamare mein nahi aa raha hai kya mamla hai main wahi puch raha hu.
Executive: Kyunki dekhiye sir aisa generally abhi to.
Customer: Iski koi setting hai setting change kara do kya pareshani hai.
Executive: Aisa to generally sir hota nahi hai let me check it once na main ek bar.
Customer: Us din bhi us din bhi meri aapse baat hui us din se ab tak theek hi nahi hua hai ye ab main do char panch din ke liye ghar chala gaya to char panch din phone mein maine laptop use kara nahi aur isme mujhe kuch dekhne ko mila nahi to maine iski enquiry bhi unse seedhi uthai.
Executive: Dekhiye us din us din to ye hua tha ki jab aap search kar rahe the matlab jab aap search kar rahe the jo aapko lead desktop pe dikh rahi thi wo jab aap search kar rahe the aapko dikh to rahi thi wo phone mein.
Customer: Hai na.
Customer: Are nahi ye nahi ho raha dekho main batau abhi main current recent phone mein khol raha hu to isme 16 ghante bhi purani dikha raha hai tab tak baad dikhti hai.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Tab tak baad ki 16 ghante ki dikha diya aur main is system mein on karu abhi bilkul recent se refresh karu to refresh karne ke baad bhi ek minute purani jo dikha raha hai Telangana ki hai 11 minute purani medical plus Kochi Kerala ki hai 28 minute purani Khatta Odisha ki hai out outing structure Khatta Odisha ki minute purani hai 34 minute purani hai 44 minute purani hai ek ghanta purani hai ab main laptop to gale mein dal ke nahi ghum sakta bar bar laptop pe dekhunga jaake.
Executive: Bilkul bilkul sir wo to aapki baat main samajh gayi maine aapko main aapko yahi to us din bhi jo explain kiya tha wo yahi kiya tha ki jo desktop hai us pe thodi jaldi aa jati hai aur agar aapko phone se by lead consume karni hai to aap kisi product.
Customer: Aisa nahi hota hai isme bhi jo phone mein hatho hath current seva do char minute aage piche saat saat minute aage piche chalta hai bas laptop ke hisab se aur mobile ke hisab se itna nahi hona baki char ghante 20 ghante purani dikha diya ab main bata raha hu ab itni enquiryo mein jo main aapko bata raha hu seedhi resign pe main click kar raha hu all location pe laga ke phone mein to 16 ghante 16 ghante purana dikha diya ki 16 ghante pehle aayi hai enquiry to phone mein asal mein kya kar paunga main batao 16 ghante 18 ghante 20 ghante 22 ghante.
Executive: Aur aap ye keh rahe hai ki jo bhi aapke phone.
Customer: Dusre kiske phone mein dekh rahe hai aap jisme recent by lead dikha rahi hai sari.
Customer: Are aap hi ka dekh lo Motilal Somani dekh lo Das Aksar point dekh lo bahut sari gane logo se baat chit kari maine tumhare to system ye chal raha hai bole hamare to theek chal gaya phone mein mere mein hi kyu dikkat aa rahi hai.
Executive: Bilkul sahi baat hai.
Customer: Unki services bhi testing hai kya sir iska.
Executive: Unki services bhi testing hai kya sir sir.
Customer: Unki testing maine dekho testing mein aur maxima ya aur star mein koi fark nahi hai sirf do enquiry ka aage piche fark aata hai theek hai.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Usse koi fark nahi padta hai isse agar testing mein agar humne ek bande star le rakha hai star mein aur meri testing ke usme sirf do enquiry ka aage piche fark hai uski do files ho jati hai meri do piche chal rahi hai.
Executive: Aisa nahi hota hai sir aapko aisa kisne bola hai sir.
Customer: Are maine khud apni enquiry by lead milai hai bhai.
Executive: Aapne milai hongi wo baat theek hai sir lekin aap samjho koi humse lekin sir aap baat suno aap baat suniye pehle aap baat suniye aapne kaise bol diya ki ek hi hota hai do char ka fark hota hai koi fark bahut bada fark hota hai sir aapne jo service li hai na aap uska cost comparison kijiye aur star aur leader ki services ka cost comparison kijiye sir.
Customer: Do dono ki enquiry badha denge aur by lead badha denge baki kuch nahi karoge main to usko chala sir aisa are sir koi by lead badhane ka paisa koi nahi dega sir.
Executive: Theek hai hum by lead ki baat karte hai na aap ye batate hai ki hamare phone mein iska jo same chalna chahiye laptop mein aap kon sa phone use karte hai aap kon sa phone use karte hai aap.
Customer: Vivo Vivo V40e naya phone liya hai maine setting kitna time ho gaya phone ko sir.
Executive: Ek saal hi hua abhi lagbhag liye hue abhi 18 ek saal hua hai ek saal ho gaya aapke phone ko theek hai.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Aap apne phone ki settings mein jaiye aur waha par ja kar ke latest update check kijiye aapka jo abhi phone hai phone ka version jo hai wo latest hai ek bar check kijiye ja kar ke aur update kijiye agar nahi hai to sir.
Customer: Mera mera mera automatic version update hota hai 15 din mein sir main bhi vivo phone main main bhi vivo use kar rahi hu sir vivo 19 vivo y200 5g sir main use kar rahi hu aur mere mein bhi na sir update aata hai jab bhi bhi update aata hai to wo mujhe notification deta hai tab main usko allow karti hu then wo update hota hai automatically update nahi hota hai aap meri baat manoge to thoda sa main bhi aapki help karungi aap nahi.
Customer: Abhi abhi abhi karta hu main.
Executive: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Buyleads not showing up instantly on phone.

- Showing older buyleads despite refreshing the app.

- Believes there's no difference between testing services.



Resolution:

- Suggested searching and filtering by product.

- Asked to check for latest phone software updates.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will check for phone updates.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, mobile app, updates, subscription
